     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox14010160">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14010160">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14010160">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Find Statistics &amp; Data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content14010160">
          <p style="text-align: left;">
           <strong>
            On this page:
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p style="text-align: left;">
           Multi-purpose Sources
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009723">
             United States
            </a>
            &nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009724">
             International
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p style="text-align: left;">
           Topical Sources
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009725">
             Agriculture &amp; Food
            </a>
            &nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009726">
             Business, Economy, &amp; Labor
            </a>
            &nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009727">
             Criminal Justice
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009728">
             Education
            </a>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009729">
             Environment
            </a>
            &nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009730">
             Health
            </a>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874385#14009731">
             Population &amp; Demographics
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt14010160" class="boxatt">

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox14009723">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009723">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009723">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Multi-purpose Sources: United States and International
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009723">
          <div id="boxatt14009723" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776436">
              <a id="link_16776436" href="http://fedstats.sites.usa.gov/agencies/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776436,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808350}); ">
               Agencies Providing Federal Statistical Information (FedStats)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to official statistical information produced by the U.S. federal government.  Browse by agency to connect to agencies' websites.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776437">
              <a id="link_16776437" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://hsus.cambridge.org/HSUSWeb/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776437,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808388}); ">
               Historical Statistics of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics from colonial times to modern day covering population, work and welfare, economic structure and performance, economic sectors, and governance and international relations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776438">
              <a id="link_16776438" href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776438,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808345}); ">
               ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A data archive of research in the social sciences. Specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.  Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776439">
              <a id="link_16776439" href="http://lehighvalleyresearch.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776439,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808489}); ">
               Lehigh Valley Research Consortium
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Quantitative and qualitative data on the Lehigh Valley on: demographics, public opinion, economic indicators, non-profit sector, governmental sector, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776440">
              <a id="link_16776440" href="http://pasdc.hbg.psu.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776440,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808479}); ">
               Pennsylvania State Data Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Official source of demographic and economic data for Pennsylvania.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776441">
              <a id="link_16776441" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776441,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776442">
              <a id="link_16776442" href="http://www.census.gov/compendia/statab/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776442,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808395}); ">
               Statistical Abstract of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The authoritative and comprehensive summary of statistics on the social, political, and economic organization of the United States.  Current and archived editions (1995- ) are available online, as well.   Old print editions (1886- ) are in the Trexler Library Government Documents section starting at C 3.134:886.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009724">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009724">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009724">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Multi-purpose Sources: International
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009724">
          <div id="boxatt14009724" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776443">
              <a id="link_16776443" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776443,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808438}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information, including statistics, on the history, people, government, economy, geography, communications, transportation, military, and transnational issues for hundreds of world entities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776444">
              <a id="link_16776444" href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776444,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808345}); ">
               ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A data archive of research in the social sciences. Specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.  Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776445">
              <b>
               International Historical Statistics, 1750-2000
              </b>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: Main Collection (Ref.) 310 M681i vol. 1-3 (Level B)
               <br />
               Provides key economic and social indicators over the last 250 years.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776446">
              <a id="link_16776446" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776446,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776447">
              <a id="link_16776447" href="http://www.offstats.auckland.ac.nz/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776447,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808360}); ">
               OFFSTATS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to free official, international statistics resources by country, region, and subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776448">
              <a id="link_16776448" href="http://data.worldbank.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776448,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808358}); ">
               World Bank Data
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics for countries around the world on a wide variety of topics, including education-related topics.  From the World Bank.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009725">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009725">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009725">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Agriculture and Food
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009725">
          <div id="boxatt14009725" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776449">
              <a id="link_16776449" href="http://www.nass.usda.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776449,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776449}); ">
               National Agricultural Statistics Service
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics on "virtually every aspect of U.S. agriculture, [including]: production and supplies of food and fiber, prices paid and received by farmers, farm labor and wages, farm finances, chemical use, changes in the demographics of U.S. producers," and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776450">
              <a id="link_16776450" href="http://www.fao.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776450,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776450}); ">
               Food and Agriculture Organization (United Nations)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Agricultural, food, and food safety statistics by region, country, and world.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009726">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009726">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009726">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Business, Economy, and Labor
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009726">
          <div id="boxatt14009726" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776451">
              <a id="link_16776451" href="http://www.bls.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776451,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776451}); ">
               U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Find statistics and data on inflation, spending, employment, wages, productivity, and more. Some international data.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776452">
              <a id="link_16776452" href="http://www.wto.org/index.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776452,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776452}); ">
               World Trade Organization
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Trade data by region, sector, product, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009727">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009727">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009727">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Criminal Justice
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009727">
          <div id="boxatt14009727" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776454">
              <a id="link_16776454" href="http://www.ojp.usdoj.gov/bjs/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776454,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776454}); ">
               Bureau of Justice Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Information on crime, criminal offenders, victims of crime, and the operation of justice systems at all levels of government."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776453">
              <a id="link_16776453" href="http://purl.access.gpo.gov/GPO/LPS3909" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776453,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776453}); ">
               Sourcebook of Criminal Justice Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brings together data from more than 100 sources about many aspects of criminal justice in the United States. Print copies of editions from 1981 to the present are available in Trexler Library's Government Documents section starting at J 29.9/6.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009728">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009728">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009728">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Education
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009728">
          <div id="boxatt14009728" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776455">
              <a id="link_16776455" href="http://nces.ed.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776455,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12598882}); ">
               National Center for Education Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Find statistics re. early childhood, elementary, secondary, and post-secondary education.  From the U.S. Department of Education.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776456">
              <a id="link_16776456" href="http://www.pde.state.pa.us/portal/server.pt/community/data_and_statistics/7202" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776456,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599029}); ">
               PDE Data and Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information about schools, student progress, graduation rates, school districts in Pennsylvania.  From the Pennsylvania Department of Education.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776457">
              <a id="link_16776457" href="http://www.uis.unesco.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776457,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776457}); ">
               UNESCO Institute for Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Global and internationally comparable statistics on education, science, culture and communication."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009729">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009729">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009729">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Environment
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009729">
          <div id="boxatt14009729" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776458">
              <a id="link_16776458" href="http://earthtrends.wri.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776458,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776458}); ">
               World Resources Institute: EarthTrends
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "Comprehensive online database, maintained by the World Resources Institute, that focuses on the environmental, social, and economic trends that shape our world."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009730">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009730">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009730">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Health
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009730">
          <div id="boxatt14009730" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776459">
              <a id="link_16776459" href="http://www.cdc.gov/datastatistics/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776459,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776459}); ">
               Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Covers a wide variety of health topics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25163171">
              <a id="link_25163171" href="http://www.statistics.health.pa.gov/Pages/default.aspx#.VrJojFLELCt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25163171,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25163171}); ">
               Pennsylvania Health Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776460">
              <a id="link_16776460" href="http://www.who.int/en/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776460,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776460}); ">
               World Health Organization (WHO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               International data on mortality, diseases, services, health systems, and more.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox14009731">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009731">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009731">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Topical Sources: Population and Demographics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content14009731">
          <div id="boxatt14009731" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link16776461">
              <a id="link_16776461" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776461,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808343}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776462">
              <a id="link_16776462" href="http://www.census.gov/prod/www/abs/decennial/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776462,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776462}); ">
               Census of Population and Housing
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Decennial censuses from the U.S. Census Bureau from 1790 to the present are available online. Print copies of the decennial census from 1880 on are available in Trexler Library's Government Documents starting at C3:223.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776463">
              <a id="link_16776463" href="http://www.census.gov/ipc/www/idb/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776463,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16776463}); ">
               International Data Base (U.S. Census Bureau)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Basic demographic information by country and region.  From the U.S. Census Bureau.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16776464">
              <a id="link_16776464" href="http://www.census.gov/aboutus/stat_int.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16776464,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Get Started with Library Research', 'page_name' : 'Find Statistics &amp; Data'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808362}); ">
               International Statistical Agencies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to international statistical agencies.  From the U.S. Census Bureau.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

           &nbsp;
          </div>

           Get Help

         </div>

           Need more help with this?&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/ask-a-librarian.html">
            Ask a Librarian
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <br />
           Need help with writing?&nbsp; Contact the
           <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/main/academics/writing/center/">
            Writing Center
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt13943779" class="boxatt">
